page.title: 15WATERBEACH
page.content:
The Goodwood Park Hotel stands at the entrance gate to Goodwood House at Waterbeach and is a new extension to the Richmond Arms. The Richmond Arms has been an inn since 1786. The new hotel has 50 bedrooms including 3 suites. Each bedroom has direct dial telephones, radio and remote control televisions. The Dukes restaurant seats 70 people and the Richmond Arms serves bar snacks. There are also two large rooms suitable for conferences and seat 40 people each.If you drive in the Waterbeach gates to Goodwood Park you come to the horse events area. This is where International dressage events take place.
By Heather Eade
